name: BulletCell
description:
Welcome to BulletCell, in this short concept demo, your job is to run and gun against some AI that have gone rogue. The goal is to get your buddy P.I.N.C.H. to the exit. What purpose does P.I.N.C.H. serve? Nothing really, he has a funny walk and makes things better just by being together with him.

Warning: guns in this game are incredibly inaccurate, usage with patience is recommended.
